document_data.name: Tsabrak
document_data.mainbody: '''Tsabrak''' was a [[drider]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was one of [[Houndaer Tuin'Tarl]] and [[Syrzan]]'s rebel group.
document_data.History:
Tsabrak was part of a drider colony living in tunnels near Menzoberranzan.

During the [[Silence of Lolth]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Tsabrak and others driders joined Houndaer's group in the hopes of a better future for their fellows.
